quote1.quote: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet.
quote1.author: ― Stephen Hawking

quote2.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quote2.author: ― Margaret Mead

quote3.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quote3.author: ― Anne Frank

quote4.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quote4.author: ― Mahatma Gandhi

quote5.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quote5.author: ― Theodore Roosevelt

quote6.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quote6.author: ― Albert Einstein

quote7.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quote7.author: ― Mark Twain

quote8.quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
quote8.author: ― Charles Kettering

quote9.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quote9.author: ― Alan Kay

quote10.quote: Believe you can and you are halfway there.
quote10.author: ― Theodore Roosevelt

quote11.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quote11.author: ― Anne Frank

quote12.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quote12.author: ― Dalai Lama

quote13.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quote13.author: ― Booker T. Washington

quote14.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quote14.author: ― George Eliot

quote15.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quote15.author: ― Albert Einstein

quote16.quote: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quote16.author: ― Chinese Proverb

quote17.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quote17.author: ― Eleanor Roosevelt

quote18.quote: If you tell the truth, you do not have to remember anything.
quote18.author: ― Mark Twain

quote19.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quote19.author: ― Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote20.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quote20.author: ― Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote21.quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quote21.author: ― Eleanor Roosevelt

quote22.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quote22.author: ― Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote23.quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quote23.author: ― Edith Wharton

quote24.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quote24.author: ― Colin R. Davis

quote25.quote: Self-reverence, self-knowledge, self control — these three alone lead to power.
quote25.author: ― Alfred, Lord Tennyson

quote26.quote: The only true wisdom is knowing that you know nothing.
quote26.author: ― Socrates

quote28.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quote28.author: ― Elbert Hubbard

quote29.quote: If you do not make mistakes, you are not working on hard enough problems.
quote29.author: ― Frank Wilczek

quote30.quote: Life is like a camera. Just focus on what is important, capture the good times, develop from the negatives, and if things do not work out, just take another shot.
quote30.author: ― Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote31.quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
quote31.author: ― Les Brown
